review: Very fast browsing, the voice commands work very well, I love the selection of apps to use.  I was even able to use it to stream from my PC to my TV using Splashtop android app after allowing 3rd party apps.
author: TNDealFinder

review: I have thoroughly enjoyed my Fire TV box. It is fast and delivers a very clear picture, even in standard definition. Perhaps I didn't read the instructions well enough but I find no "off" switch. I don't really like the idea of an appliance that stays on 24/7. If anyone knows more than I do, please chime in.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I've been using my blu-ray player to watch Netflix for years. I bought the Fire TV because I wanted to access my Prime shows and movies. The Fire TV is just amazing. It runs Netflix 100x faster, browsing for Prime movies is easy, and I have access to Prime music and iHeartRadio.  No longer do I need to carry my phone room to room to listen to music. I can just turn up the TV volume and walk around. I highly recommend!
author: Jball359

review: I really like this thing.  Great interface, responsive, intuitive.  My kids play games on it with an XBOX controller, waiting for the Amazon controller.  The only drawback is that I use Plex to stream network movies, and Plex doesn't work well on this.
